name: GitLab Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when GitLab events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 GitLab Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when GitLab events occur

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

owner.name: owner
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Owner | 作用: Owner of the repository | (必填项)

repository.name: repository
repository.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Name | 作用: The name of the repository | (必填项)

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: The events to listen to | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Comment (值: note) - Triggered when a new comment is made on commits, merge requests, issues, and code snippets
Confidential Issues (值: confidential_issues) - Triggered on confidential issues' events
Confidential Comments (值: confidential_note) - Triggered when a confidential comment is made
Deployments (值: deployment) - Triggered when a deployment starts/succeeds/fails/is cancelled
Issue (值: issues) - Triggered when a new issue is created or an existing issue was updated/closed/reopened
Job (值: job) - Triggered on status change of a job
Merge Request (值: merge_requests) - Triggered when a new merge request is created, an existing merge request was updated/merged/closed or a commit is added in the source branch
Pipeline (值: pipeline) - Triggered on status change of Pipeline
Push (值: push) - Triggered when you push to the repository except when pushing tags
Release (值: releases) - Release events are triggered when a release is created or updated
Tag (值: tag_push) - Triggered when you create (or delete) tags to the repository
Wiki Page (值: wiki_page) - Triggered when a wiki page is created, updated or deleted
* (值: *) - Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)
